channel.title: Find bands to play your show/bill!
channel.description: Find bands to play your show/bill!

item.title: Memory Lanes 4/25 - Looking for punk bands!
item.author: invalid@example.com (Aang)
item.category: Find bands to play your show/bill!
item.dc:creator: Aang
item.content:encoded:
Hey y’all!

I’m working on putting together a 4-band bill at Memory Lanes (on the lanes!) for Friday, April 25th, and we’re looking to fill at least two more slots. If you’ve got a punk band and are interested in playing, I’d love to get some TCUP folks on this!

Exact details are still getting confirmed, but the plan right now is:
Showtime: 8 PM - 12 AM
Set Length: 30-45 minute sets
Payment: 80/20 door split in favor of performers

Please reach out if yr interested or have any questions!
-...

Read more

item.title: Want to play TCUPs celebration/ pledge push event Sun Feb 16th?!
item.author: invalid@example.com (hayleedee)
item.category: Find bands to play your show/bill!
item.dc:creator: hayleedee
item.content:encoded:
TCUP launched our power pledge campaign in December with the goal of getting 500 musicians to sign the pledge and come organize with us! This event is the celebration of achieving that goal. IF we do not achieve 500 signatures by this event date then we will pivot to making this a pledge push event. Other purposes include introducing musicians and music community members to TCUP and getting folks organized and involved in future campaigns. Invite the performers to sign our pledge and be a...

Read more

item.title: TCUP show at Blackheart STP?
item.author: invalid@example.com (Rachael G)
item.category: Find bands to play your show/bill!
item.dc:creator: Rachael G
item.content:encoded: Nothing booked there yet. I'm just starting to really like that place and they now have their license for live music. Would love to chat more about making something happen over there.

item.title: Bismarck Punk Band looking for a twin cities show on 9/21
item.author: invalid@example.com (Dante)
item.category: Find bands to play your show/bill!
item.dc:creator: Dante
item.content:encoded:
Hey hey!

my homies in the Bismarck punk band Wasting Tape are looking for a last minute show on 9/21 in the twin cities. Anyone have a bill they could hop on or know of a bill that might be down to add a 25 min punk set? They would be happy to return the favor in Bismarck, one of the band members books at Laughing Sun Brewery which hosts great shows and pays well. Could be a good connection for anyone planning a Fargo/Bismarck weekend!

Login • Instagram

Welcome back to Instagram. Sign in to check out what your friends, family & interests have been capturing & sharing around the world.
www.instagram.com

item.title: TCUP/Industry night at White Squirrel Mon September 9th 2024
item.author: invalid@example.com (Rachael G)
item.category: Find bands to play your show/bill!
item.dc:creator: Rachael G
item.content:encoded:
Anyone interested from TCUP to join this bill? Completely open right now. Not sure how I want to build it, what theme etc.
Any interest in a TCUP promo night?
I was thinking industry night too, trying to prioritize players also in the service industry who often aren't able to play wknds/have conflicting work schedules. Hit me back with any interest or performer suggestions!
